titleStmt.title: The True manner of the Kings tryal at Westminster-Hall, by the high Court of Justice, from the twentieth day of January 1649, to the seven and twentieth of the same month. Also the true manner of his being put to death at White-hall, near the Banqueting House the 30 of January, with his speech made upon the scaffold before hee was beheaded. To the tune of, Aim not too high.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.I. and entered according to order.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.

person.persName: R.I. and entered according to order.
